abstract: United States Steel announces temporary idling of plant in Granite City, Ill, which will put 2,080 employees out of work, move spurred by reduced demand from oil and gas industry.
lead_paragraph: Closing the plant in Granite City, Ill., puts 2,080 employees out of work. The move comes as the company said it would consolidate its North American flat-rolled operations to match demand.

headline.main: United States Steel to Close Illinois Plant Temporarily
headline.print_headline: United States Steel To Close Illinois Plant Temporarily

snippet: Closing the plant in Granite City, Ill., puts 2,080 employees out of work. The move comes as the company said it would consolidate its North American flat-rolled operations to match demand.
